column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Since opening our Midtown location four years ago
column2: we have NEVER dealt with a staff member who committed any such acts
column3: and I want to assure you any infractions of this nature would be dealt with harshly. We accept the fact that our servers may miss the mark
column4: and we do everything in our power to keep our standards high. For example
column5: we hire a "Secret Shopper" program that randomly tests our staff in terms of compliance and overall service.
